title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Introducing the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat - your ultimate fitness companion! Measuring an expansive 72 inches in length and 24 inches in width, this mat provides ample space for all your yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises. With a generous thickness of 2/5 inch, crafted from soft and durable NBR foam, this mat offers unparalleled comfort and support.

Experience the joy of practicing on an extra-thick, soft cushion that protects your joints and enhances your stability during those challenging poses. Weighing just 3.11 pounds, this mat is lightweight and easy to carry, making it perfect for your on-the-go lifestyle.

But that's not all! The Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat comes with an easy-cinch carrier strap, ensuring your mat stays secure and rolls up neatly after each use. The vibrant teal color adds a pop of style to your workout, making you stand out in any setting.

Upgrade your fitness routine with the Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. Order yours today and experience the perfect blend of comfort, durability, and style!
